name: Attackpad
description:
Hello everyone! This is Attackpad! A game where you can attack and kill and throw around a little stickman! There's Houses, cars, swords, spikes, and more! 

Controls: 

Press a number from 1-7 to spawn an object. Then you can click and drag and attack with that object!

Press "R" to reset it.

Hold left click to throw the stickman around!

Press space to turn off the throwing for map editing and then press space again to fix it.

Enjoy and have a great day!

:D

-Deliriny2020
